content: **free capybara knitting pattern - a small toy perfect for scrap yarn** knit in the round and designed to be small and efficient this free capybara toy knitting pattern is ideal for using leftover yarn it s a fast satisfying knit for makers who are comfortable with basic toy construction and want to explore short row in a playful manageable way the finished capybara makes a charming handmade toy or a cozy piece of knit home décor **finished size** 8 cm / 3 in **skill level** intermediate **techniques** ● long-tail cast on ● toe-up cast on ● knit in the round ● increases and decreases stitches ● german short row
